mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_CREATEAT FROM MEMBER
SELECT ID, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_CREATEAT FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{memName}, #{memPassword}, #{memNick}, #{memEmail})
